title: Organise pictures to easily find them
content:
I have just got a Google Pixel 3 and I am really confused my the photo system.
I like to send memes; my whole phone is full of different memes for different reactions (400 pics). On my old phone, I could create folders to organise my memes, so I didn't have to go through all of them to find the one I want to send. 
I was wondering if there is anything similar I can do for Pixel 3, so I can sort my memes into groups to send them easier on FB messager and via text, without having to go through all my photos.
Thanks
